name: Sanhima Rooftop Tent Hard Shell - Hotham Lite Overland Aluminium Roof Top Tent 4.56" Slimline, w/Tri-Color LED Strip Light & 1.97” Thick Mattress, for Car SUV Truck Camping, 2-3 People
short_description: 420D double ripstop Oxford fabric and 280GT poly-cotton
Imported

Slimline & Lightweight: At 134.48 lbs, the Hotham Lite is 32% lighter than Hotham. This reduction in weight not only improves fuel efficiency but also makes transport and handling much easier, redefining what it means to travel light! With its upgraded slimline design, it packs down to a mere 4.57 in, which is ideal for fitting into garage or undercover parking areas. Plus, this also reduces wind resistance for a smoother, more efficient drive.

AquaShield Tech: Our AquaShield coating delivers unbeatable UV, water, and corrosion resistance. With 420D double ripstop Oxford fabric and 280GT poly-cotton boasting a 5,000mm waterproof rating and UV 50+ protection, you’re covered in any weather. The aluminum honeycomb panel and frame offer superb insulation in both hot and cool temperatures, and a 1.18 in elevated base offers a strong defense against water intrusion.

Cozy Meets Privacy: Experience ultimate privacy with the silver-lined interior of the Hotham Lite. Rain or shine, stay comfortable with dual side windows equipped with mesh rain flies, and a ceiling window that ensures a breezy interior. The Hotham Lite offers a spacious interior measuring 81.50 x 46.06 in, perfect for a family of three. Enjoy extra comfort with a high-density 1.97 in thick foam mattress, making every camping trip cozy and restful.

User-Friendliness: With interior pockets and a shoe bag, you can keep your gear organized and easily accessible. And our tri-color LED strip light provides bright white light and warm sunlight white for interior illumination and a mosquito-repellent amber light to let you relax without attracting bugs. With load capacity of 330.69lbs, the 90.55 in long telescopic ladder can be hooked at 3 sides.

Quick and Easy Set-Up: Our aluminium rooftop tent can be set up in just 30 seconds. Just unlock, give the rooftop tent a push and the gas struts will take over. Folding down is a breeze with the ergonomic strap, and locks ensure no accidental popping, even in high winds or rough terrain. With a 2-year warranty included, you can enjoy peace of mind knowing you're getting a top-quality rooftop tent.
product_description: Slimline yet packed with adventure, our Hotham Lite is the more nimble sibling of the Hotham series RTTs. Whether you're an urban explorer or a backcountry adventurer, it offers a streamlined pack-down and lightweight design—delivering the best of both worlds—comfort and ease of use, all without the bulk. At just 4.57 inch in height when packed down, the Hotham Lite makes undercover parking and tight garage spaces a breeze. And at only 128.97 lbs--an impressive 32% lighter than the Hotham--it’s easy to handle and can be installed even on a compact SUV. Crafted from 420D Oxford Fabric and 280GSM Polyester-Cotton, it boasts 5,000mm waterproofing and UV 50+ protection, offering exceptional durability in the harshest conditions. Inside, you'll find a spacious 81.49 in x 46.06 in sleeping area with a ceiling window that invites natural light and breeze. The built-in LED light also allows you to set the perfect mood. Experience outdoor living at its finest with the San Hima Hotham Lite!

name: SanHima SUV Tent for Family Camping - Waterproof & Windproof SUV Tailgate Tent with Storage Bag for Van Jeep CUV Model Y, Up to 6-8 Person
short_description: 210D Oxford Fabric
Imported

Fits Most Vehicles: Whether you have a big SUV, a compact CUV, or even a sedan (yep, it’ll fit your Tesla Model Y, too), this SUV tent’s got you covered. It’s got a universal sleeve and adjustable straps, it’ll slide right into your vehicle. And if it doesn’t have roof racks? No worries—this SUV tent can do it with or without them. Forget about complicated setups—just attach the tent to your car, and you’re done.

Dual Setup Flexibility: If you want easy access to your gear, just attach our car rear tent to your the trunk, and everything’s right there when you need it. But if you’re looking to spread out and need a bit more space, go ahead and set this SUV tent up as a standalone tent. Either way, you’ve got tons of room to fit your needs. And don’t worry about the weather—our SUV tent will keep you dry and comfortable.

Big on Space: Measuring 9.51 ft x 8.86 ft with a 6.40 ft ceiling, this SUV tent easily accommodates up to 6 adults. Whether you're sleeping or stashing gear, there’s plenty of space. Stay organized with handy side pockets and ceiling hooks, and enjoy a refreshing breeze with the open windows and mesh panels. It’s your perfect setup for comfortable, uninterrupted outdoor living.

Built for Adventure: It’s made from 210D Oxford fabric with a 3,000mm waterproof rating. The floor is fully sealed, so you don’t have to worry about any moisture sneaking in. And the detachable awning is made from 210D “Mirror” fabric, which not only gives you UPF 50+ protection but also 3,000mm waterproofing. Plus, the reinforced fiberglass poles ensure it’ll hold up after all your wildest adventures.

Stress-Free Setup: You’re not going to waste any time setting up this SUV tent. In just a few simple steps, you’ll have it ready. First, assemble the frame, then stake it down, hang the awning, and that’s it! It’s fast and simple. And if the wind picks up, the four anchor points and guy lines keep the car rear tent anchored, so it won’t blow away. Plus, with a 1-year warranty, you can feel confident that it’s built to last.

short_description: 600D Oxford Fabric with Full Blackout Lining
Imported

Roomy But Still Lightweight: The San Hima CapeTop rooftop tent is a breeze to travel with, but don’t let its compact size fool you—it packs a punch when unfolded! Thanks to the clever Snap Fold System, this fold out rooftop tent is lightweight (just 131.5 lbs) and easy to carry, but once you unfold the San Hima rooftop tent, you’ve got a spacious 84.65 x 51.18 x 40.94 inches interior waiting for you to kick back and relax.

Digital Convenience Right at Your Fingertips: Need to stay connected on your trip? No problem. Charge up your phone, tablet, or anything else with USB-C, USB-A, or the CIG socket of the digital panel, all with the simple flick of a switch. Plus, we’ve thought ahead and added an air conditioner duct hole, so you can easily hook up your AC hose and stay cool while keeping rain outside where they belong.

Built to Last, No Compromise: The main body is made from rugged 600D Oxford fabric with a blackout lining that gives you 2,000mm of waterproof protection. The full-coverage canopy is built from the same tough 150D Oxford fabric with a silver lining, giving it a 3,000mm waterproof rating and UPF 50+ protection to keep you covered in more ways than one—whether you’re stepping out or getting back in.

Comfort Just Got an Upgrade: The canopy uses Light Shielding Tech to block out the morning sun, ensuring cool and dark inside until you're ready to greet the day. When it’s time to relax, you’ll sink into 2.17 inches of high-density foam mattress, designed to cradle your body and give you that perfect night’s sleep. And if you want to wind down, the adjustable amber LED strip gives the right ambience for reading or just chilling.

Everything You Need, Right Where You Need It: You’ll appreciate the little things once you settle in. Dual side windows, a rear window, and a front door with fine meshes create a comfortable environment. Plus, the interior's got you covered with ceiling organizers and shoe pockets to keep your stuff in order. And this rooftop tent for SUV comes with a two-year warranty—because we’re confident in the quality and durability.
